channel.title: Vertical Garden Design
channel.description: Vertical Garden Design is a Swedish company dedicated to vertical gardens since 2004. We have long experience of working on international projects when it comes to planning, logistics, installation and maintenance. Our vertical gardens can be found in hotels, restaurants, offices and facades from Barcelona to Dubai, Beijing, New York, London and Stockholm.

item.title: Vertical garden
item.description: Our vertical gardens can be installed indoors and outdoors, and made in any shape and size.

item.title: Pinnacle
item.description: Pinnacle is a plant sculpture and freestanding vertical garden with plants on all sides. It can be individually shaped to create a unique landscape silhouette or a monolith.

item.title: Canopy
item.description: Canopy is a suspended garden for making plant ceilings. Cascading plants hang down several meters and are irrigated automatically.
